1   package fr.mcc.ginco.extjs.view.node;
2   
3   import java.text.Collator;
4   import java.util.Locale;
5   
6   import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Value;
7   import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;
8   
9   @Component(value = "thesaurusListNodeFactory")
10  public class ThesaurusListNodeFactory {
11  
12  	@Value("${ginco.default.language}")
13  	private String defaultLang;
14      
15      private Collator collator;
16      
17      private Collator getCollator()
18      {
19      	if (collator==null)
20      	{
21      		collator = Collator.getInstance(new Locale(defaultLang));
22      	} 
23  		return collator;
24      }
25      
26      public ThesaurusListBasicNode getListBasicNode()
27      {
28      	return new ThesaurusListBasicNode(getCollator());
29      }
30  }
